Banque Internationale du Bénin (B.I.B.E.) bụ ụlọ akụ mba Benin
Ọ bụ onye otu West African Bankers' Association.
O nwere isi ụlọ ọrụ ya na Carrefour des 3 Banques na Cotonou mana o nwekwara alaka na Porto-Novo na Parakou
Naịjirịa na-achịkwa ụlọ akụ ahụ, na First Bank of Nigeria Plc
nwere òkè 13.6%, Union Bank of Nigeria plc
(13%), Nigerian Economic Operatives (47.7%), Nigerian Bureau of Public Enterprises (6.7%), na mgbe ahụ First Interstate Merchant Bank Ltd
(11.1%) na n'ikpeazụ Beninese Economic Operatives na 8.2%.
